active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a scenario where a healthcare app must protect patient PII during transmission, debate the advantages and disadvantages of using symmetric vs. asymmetric encryption. Consider factors like performance, key management, threat models (e.g., man-in-the-middle attacks), and compliance with NIST standards. Groups present trade-offs and vote on the optimal hybrid approach.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

Use distractor protocol rigorously. Incorporate: Industry standards (NIST SP 800-53 controls, SP 800-175), real examples (Equifax breach), hybrid crypto, SSDLC integration, post-quantum hints. Ensure university-level pedagogy: active recall, spaced repetition, progressive complexity. Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards, each as: {"front": "...", "back": {"answer": "...", "explanation": "...", "bloom_level": "...", "scaffolding_layer": "...", "references": "...", "active_learning_tie_in": "..."}}.
